ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We raised him up to a high place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We raised him to an exalted station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We exalted him to a lofty position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We granted him a high position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We lifted him to a high position. (Living with soul & body in heaven, after his death.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We raised him to a high station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We raised him high in Heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We raised him up to a high place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We raised him to high station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We raised him to a high position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We exalted him to a position lofty. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We raised him to an exalted station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We raised him to a lofty station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We raised him to a high station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We raised him to a high place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We raised him to a high position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We raised him to a high station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:57] And We raised him to a high station — he is alive in the fourth, or sixth, or seventh heaven, or [he is] in Paradise into which he was admitted after he was made to experience death and brought back to life, and he has not exited therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We raised him to high station) in Paradise.
